body: The JJ one at 166 im getting mixed vibes one its NTR but at the same time its the good one the Husband is a dick(more focused on his business than family ir Wife and lil bro) lil bro wants it to be similar to when they were younger and had fun with cooking and stuff while wife is stuck in between

what page is the cover on?
So, the constructor wife and her timid husband got another part. That's gonna legit happy ending.

Pg166 the juna juna juice story… art is great and man I like ntr but this one doesn’t sit right with me. Like the culprits are usually depicted as bad for what they’ve done but this one depicts the two people cheating in a positive light despite all the sacrifices the elder brother made. And on top of that it looks like the baby is the younger brother’s… and it shows it as a happy ending… what lol. That’s what I got from translating some of the pages with MTL, have to see when things are more clear with a better translation. Honestly I prefer the NTR that’s darker.
On page 29 is that a pic of an actual nigga?! That page is driving me insane
